title: SCI - FI LEVELS (Music Loops for level design)
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! 10 Sci Fi Level Based music Loops all in the key of 'E Minor' for seamless level transitions between your gaming project.
longDescription:
WELCOME TO SCI - FI LEVELS (Music Loops for level design)

The pack has been crafted for menu style music & in-game level music, screen titles/background music for your Unreal Project. All of the music has been produced in the Key of 'E Minor' for seamless and smooth music transitions between your level designs/developments during gameplay.

🎮

PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.

🎮

LISTEN TO SCI-FI-LEVELS HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-preview/s-JP3jFqYY5fv
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  All music in the key of 'E Minor' for seamless/Smooth audio transitions between levels in your game
  • All Percussion in this asset pack was recorded (sampled ) at Skywalker Sound Studio in California.
  •  Music Loops crafted in a SCI-FI Style for level design/gameplay

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/ 16 BIT

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22 minutes 3 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-preview/s-JP3jFqYY5fv


Important/Additional Notes: Please Email us for customer enquires & additional questions related to our products @ cerberus_audio@outlook.com
